| Overview                = The '''Catholic Church''' is the largest [[Jesus of Nazareth (Earth-616)|Christian]] church, with over a billion followers worldwide. As one of the oldest religious institutions on [[Earth]], it has played a prominent role in the history of Western Civilization. The church is lead by the Bishop of Rome better known as the known as the "[[Pope]]". The church is based in [[Vatican City]] an independent nation located in [[Rome (Italy)|Rome]], [[Italy]].
| History                 = 
===Origin===
The Catholic Church proclaimed itself to be the church that [[Jesus of Nazareth (Earth-616)|Jesus Christ]] died for, the church that was established and built by the apostles.

===8th Century===
In 800 A.D., [[Charlemagne (King) (Earth-616)|Emperor Charlemagne]], ruler of the [[Frankish Empire]] was crowned Roman emperor by Pope Leo III.{{r|Marvel Atlas #1|; [[Germany]]'s entry}}

===Darkhold===
In 1145, A.D., the demon God [[Chthon (Earth-616)|Chthon]] committed most of his evil spells to documents called the [[Darkhold]] scrolls. An evil monk named [[Aelfric (Earth-616)|Aelfric]] eventually gathered them together but he was burned at the stake. The Catholic church came into possession of the scrolls. [[Paolo Montesi (Earth-616)|Paolo Montesi]] was a monk who was the curator of the Darkhold scrolls and was tasked with translating them. Paolo learned of something called the Malachy Prophecy which told of the tenure of each pope for nearly the next thousand years. Paolo gave this information to [[Pope Eugene III]]. The Pope declared that the scrolls and everything related to the Darkhold would be compiled into one book of which Paolo and his family would be entrusted. The Pope allowed Paolo a special dispensation to marry so Paolo's descendants would safe guard the book. Paolo was killed by the first vampire [[Varnae (Earth-616)|Varnae]] who had hoped to keep the church from using the book to wipe out all [[Vampires]]. Paolo's infant son Giacomo was born soon after and for eight centuries the Montesi family dedicated themselves to destroying vampires.{{r|Doctor Strange, Sorcerer Supreme #12|13}}

===[[Crusades]]===
From the 11th to 16th centuries,{{citation}} the Catholic Church began military campaigns with aim of capturing [[Jerusalem]] from Islamic rule.{{r|ClanDestine #5}} During this time the [[Knights Templar (Earth-616)|Knights Templar]] becoming one of the wealthiest and most powerful of the Christian military orders in [[Europe]]. They were officially endorsed by the Catholic Church. The Knights wore distinctive white mantles with a red cross. They were one of the many groups to take part in the invasion of the holy lands in the middle east.{{r|Ares #3}} During the Crusades the Knights Templar attempted and invasion of the African nation of [[Wakanda]]. They were unable to defeat the tiny African nation as they defeated the European invaders with ease.{{r|Fantastic Four #608}}

===[[Inquisition]]===
The Tribunal of the Holy Office of the Inquisition, commonly known as the Spanish Inquisition was started by the Catholic Church to establish dominance across it's territories persecuting those of others faiths. A powerful sorcerer by the name of [[Esteban Corazón de Ablo (Earth-616)|Diablo]] gained power in Spain during this time, he used the [[Philosopher's Stone]] to thwart his enemies. Despite all his power, the Inquisition were many and he was soon forced to flee Spain, apparently losing the Philosopher's Stone in the process.{{r|Fantastic Four #525}} The [[Skrulls]] were active was during the Inquisition.{{r|Europa #0}}

===15th-16th Century===
From the 15th to 16th century the church was heavily influenced by the Borgia Family who became prominent in ecclesiastical and political affairs. The family producing two popes: [[Callixtus III (Earth-616)|Pope Callixtus III]], and [[Alexander VI (Earth-616)|Pope Alexander VI]]. One of the worst of the family was [[Lucrezia Borgia (Earth-616)|Lucrezia Borgia]].{{r|Gorilla Man #1}}{{r|Deadpool Team-Up Vol 2 889}}

===18th Century===
In 1774, religious scholar [[Cagliostro (O-Bengh) (Earth-616)|Alessandro Di Cagliostro]] was searching for the secret of [[Glossary:Immortality|immortality]]. Cagliostro learned the location of the 'Book of Sins', the [[Darkhold]]. The Lord of [[Vampires]], [[Vlad Dracula (Earth-616)|Dracula]], was then the latest owner. Cagliostro managed to steal the book from the gypsy who the had been sent to the Vatican by Dracula, and earned the vampire's enmity. From the Darkhold, Cagliostro learned the secrets that would enable him to make an elixir of immortality, but needed exotic components unavailable to him.{{r|Dracula Lives ##5}}

In 1789, the Vatican ordered the arrest of Cagliostro on the grounds that Freemasonry was a heresy, and he was imprisoned in the Castle of San Leo near Montefeltro. He was reputed to have died in 1795 in a cell in Italy's papal states, but in reality Cagliostro had at some point left to continue his unending quest for occult power.{{r|Doctor Strange, Sorcerer Supreme #8}}

===Modern Era===
[[Isaiah Curwen (Earth-616)|Isaiah Curwen]] was once a member of the Vatican and was a potential successor to the Pope. However, he was overlooked due to his youth and fanaticism. He then studied the black arts and was determined to become God's weapon and fight against the followers of Satan. While studying to be "the Silver Dagger," he traveled the world slaughtering those he viewed as his opponents. He then sought out The Ancient One, but found Dr. Strange instead.{{r|Doctor Strange Vol 2 5}}

After the possession and death of Father [[Ramon Joquez (Earth-616)|Ramon Joquez]] by the spirit of the evil monk [[Aelfric (Earth-616)|Aelfric]] the suspicions of [[Giuseppe Montesi (Earth-616)|Monsignor Montesi]] arose. Using the Vatican library he was able to uncover the Montesi formula his family had been seeking for centuries.{{r|Dracula Lives #6}} He was killed by Dracula but before he died Montesi told Dracula that he mailed the formula to Dracula's nemesis Quincy Harker.{{r|Doctor Strange, Sorcerer Supreme #9}}

In 1978, Polish cardinal [[Karol Wojtyla (Earth-616)|Karol Wojtyla]] became the new pope and assumed the name John Paul II.{{r|Life of Pope John Paul II Vol 1 1}} A race called the [[Hidden Ones (Earth-616)|Hidden Ones]] spread in the positions of power and, among other things, maneuvered John Paul II to cause schism in his ranks.{{r|Fantastic Four Vol 3 54}}

The Catholic Church supported [[Ulysses Klaw (Earth-616)|Klaw]]'s invasion of [[Wakanda]], sending their mercenary the [[Augustine du Lac (Earth-616)|Augustine du Lac]] the [[Black Knight]]. He wielded the [[Ebony Blade]], which was found by the Vatican, and riding a [[Aragorn (Vatican's Black Knight) (Earth-616)|flying horse named Aragorn]].{{r|Black Panther Vol 4 3}}

During the [[Skrull Invasion]] of Earth a [[Deviant Skrulls|Skrull]] infiltrated the Catholic Church and took the form of the Pope.<Ref>{{cl|Secret Invasion #5}}: The Pope is depicted as Pope Benedict XVI. This should be considered a [[Glossary:Topical Reference|topical reference]] per the [[Glossary:Sliding Timescale|Sliding Timescale]] of [[Earth-616]].</ref>
